name: Subterra (itch)
description:
Your ship crashes and you land on an unknown planet. The surface is constantly bombarded by radiation and solar wind so you are forced to go deep down  hoping that you'll find nothing but dead rocks.

Upgrade your tools with what you find to venture farther and farther below.

Any feedback is welcome , If you have suggestions or gripes with the game please share them!

Warning : if you continue the game from a save that is from a previous version, some new features may not appear.

You can see the controls in-game by pressing F1.

Controls [Keyboard] (Controller):

  • [A / D] (LEFT STICK) to lean while in the air or walk if on the ground
  • [SPACE] (LT) to activate jetpack
  • [Q] (B) to change beam mode
  • [E] (A) to interact / use selected item in inventory
  • [F] (Y) to open inventory
  • [X] (X) to drop selected item in inventory / storage selection in permanent stash
  • Left mouse button / (RT) to activate laser
  • [Esc] (Start) to quit
  • [W / S/ Scrollwheel] (Dpad ) navigate menus / scroll map
